short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Physna Nexus+ is a tool that augments Unity Asset Manager with search capabilities powered by Physna.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the Full Potential of Your 3D Assets

With Physna Nexus+ you can search and analyze your 3D models in Unity Asset Manager in a fraction of the time.

• Quickly Discover Alternatives with Intuitive 3D Search
• Instantly Locate Parts Using Image-Based Search
• Enhance and Simplify Your Workflow with Advanced, Integrated Tools

Geometric search leverages Physna's patented technology to find 3D files inside of Unity Asset Manager that have similar geometry to the file selected. This is useful for finding alternative parts from your existing library of assets.

Visual Search utilizes Physna's search capabilities to find 3D files inside of Unity Asset Manager that look visually similar to the image provided. Any image can be used as long as its a png, jpg, jpeg, or gif and is less than 10MB.
